text: Cosimo Massimo Fusco (born 23 September 1962) is an Italian movie and television actor. He is known for his role as Paolo in Friends. He was born in Matera, Italy on September 23, 1962. He lives in Rome, Italy. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Cosimo Fusco
